item.title: $Lucid Token Use Cases: An Overview
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
The $LUCID token is the internal currency of the Lucidia metaverse. It is used for all transactions. Here is a detailed list of the different ways the $LUCID token can be used:   Gaming The $LUCID token is used to buy game items, virtual assets, NFT trading, virtual real estate, and do other in-game transactions […]

The post $Lucid Token Use Cases: An Overview appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
The $LUCID token is the internal currency of the Lucidia metaverse. It is used for all transactions. Here is a detailed list of the different ways the $LUCID token can be used:

 

Gaming

The $LUCID token is used to buy game items, virtual assets, NFT trading, virtual real estate, and do other in-game transactions within the Lucidia ecosystem. This makes it easier for people to play games without having to switch between currencies or payment methods. Users can also use $LUCID tokens to buy access to the game for life or to improve their avatars and profiles. Fans of the Embryo game need $LUCID tokens to feed or change their embryos, making sure that their creatures are unique and strong. $LUCID tokens also let you join tournaments with bigger prize pools.

 

Staking

The staking program in Lucidia gives users rewards for keeping $LUCID tokens in a locked wallet for a certain amount of time. Rewards are given out in the form of $LUCID tokens, so users can buy more tokens and benefit from the growth of the ecosystem. Staking helps keep the network safe and gives users a way to support the platform while making passive income. To get people to stake, they will be offered things like private chats with the development team, access to VIP areas on the map, being put on a whitelist for Lucidia NFT presales, and specific monthly NFTs in exchange for voting rights in the Lucidia DAO system.

 

Marketplace

The idea of the metaverse is deeply woven into Lucidia’s market. All transactions in the Lucidia marketplace will use the $LUCID token to make this integration possible. A gas fee and a small fee paid in $LUCID tokens will also be part of the process of minting.

The post $Lucid Token Use Cases: An Overview appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: One billion $LUCID tokens: Putting users and the community first
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
The main currency in the Lucidia metaverse is the $LUCID token, of which there are a total of 1,000,000,000 (1 billion). At the TGE, tokens will be split between presale, public IDOs, and liquidity. This will make it possible for $LUCID to be traded on DEX and CEXs.   Here’s how the last $LUCID tokens […]

The post One billion $LUCID tokens: Putting users and the community first appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
The main currency in the Lucidia metaverse is the $LUCID token, of which there are a total of 1,000,000,000 (1 billion). At the TGE, tokens will be split between presale, public IDOs, and liquidity. This will make it possible for $LUCID to be traded on DEX and CEXs.

 

Here’s how the last $LUCID tokens will be given out:

 

Public IDOs: 4%; PreSale: 13%; Reserve and Burn: 13%; Liquidity: DEX/CEX: 5% Development: 10% Team: 6% Marketing and Community: 14% Advisors: 4% Rewards and Staking: 5% System: 9% Operation: 12% Treasury: 10%

This allocation has a 12-month cliff because 13% is set aside as a reserve or to be burned if needed to keep the $LUCID value stable. Also, 9% of $LUCID tokens are given to Lucidia users as in-game rewards and rewards for helping the platform grow, such as staking tokens. In contrast, only 4% of $LUCID tokens are available to the public through IDOs. This shows that Lucidia gives users and the community the most importance.

 

The $LUCID token is still being fine-tuned in terms of how it works. The Lucidia team cares as much about cutting-edge technology and entertainment as they do about system stability, and they know how important tokenomics are to the Lucidia metaverse as a whole. So, they won’t say that the tokenomics are done until they are sure that they meet all of the users’ needs.

 

The money earned by spending $LUCID in-game will be split in the following ways:

 

Buy back and burn to help with liquidity: 40%

Marketing: 25%

Prize pool and system of rewards: 25%

Infrastructure: 10%

Referral Program: 5%

This distribution shows that Lucidia is committed to putting users and the community first. Because 40% of earnings are used to buy back and burn LUCID, its value will rise over time.

The post One billion $LUCID tokens: Putting users and the community first appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: Race NFT, A Racing Game Driven by the Blockchain
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
Players in the cutting-edge, blockchain-based racing game Race NFT can acquire, improve, and exchange a wide variety of one-of-a-kind automobile NFTs (non-fungible tokens). Each vehicle’s worth is established by its performance in races, and can go up or down depending on how well it does. In addition, users can make their own unique and immersive […]

The post Race NFT, A Racing Game Driven by the Blockchain appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
Players in the cutting-edge, blockchain-based racing game Race NFT can acquire, improve, and exchange a wide variety of one-of-a-kind automobile NFTs (non-fungible tokens). Each vehicle’s worth is established by its performance in races, and can go up or down depending on how well it does. In addition, users can make their own unique and immersive racing experience by designing and customizing their own race tracks.

 

In-game, players can use the $LUCID token to buy automobile NFTs from the game’s marketplace. Several models of the same make and model year have different top speeds, acceleration, and handling. The NFT cars the players have purchased can then be used in races on either player-made or pre-made courses.

 

The top finishers in each race are awarded prizes that can be used to purchase new and improved car NFTs. The vehicle’s performance and resale value will both rise as a result of this. The marketplace allows users to trade vehicle NFTs with one another, creating a secondary market for the tokens and giving users the opportunity to profit from their initial investment.

 

Highlights on the technical side include Race NFT’s use of a decentralized blockchain, which provides a safe and open environment for NFTs and the game’s economy. For lightning-quick action, the game makes use of both on-chain and off-chain mechanisms. Racing NFT’s Unreal Engine 5 development ensures a smooth gameplay experience across all platforms.

 

In addition to racing their NFT cars, users may also employ in-game resources to construct and modify their own unique racetrack. These one-of-a-kind courses can be raced on or shared with other players, making racing more of a social activity. The track-building mode lets players show off their artistic and aesthetic abilities, increasing the game’s intensity.

 

In sum, Race NFT provides a fresh take on the racing genre while also showcasing the cutting-edge technology of NFTs and blockchain. Race NFT is destined to become a fan favorite among gamers thanks to its exciting gameplay, one-of-a-kind customization choices, and the ability to make and share tracks.

The post Race NFT, A Racing Game Driven by the Blockchain appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: Lucidia Metaverse: The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023 Runs on Unreal Engine 5
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
Unreal Engine 5 technology is used to run Lucidia Metaverse, which is one of the best crypto pre-sales of 2023. This game engine gives the metaverse a number of features that are important to its success: Physics Simulation: The physics simulation system in Unreal Engine allows for realistic interactions between objects, such as dynamic collisions, […]

The post Lucidia Metaverse: The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023 Runs on Unreal Engine 5 appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
Unreal Engine 5 technology is used to run Lucidia Metaverse, which is one of the best crypto pre-sales of 2023. This game engine gives the metaverse a number of features that are important to its success:

Physics Simulation: The physics simulation system in Unreal Engine allows for realistic interactions between objects, such as dynamic collisions, object destruction, and ragdoll physics. This makes the game world more immersive.

Animation: The engine has a system for animating characters that lets developers make them move in complex ways. This makes the game world feel more real and alive.

AI: Unreal Engine’s AI system lets developers make enemies that are smart and respond to what the player does. This makes the game more interesting and challenging.

Graphics: Real-time reflections, dynamic shadows, and physically-based rendering are some of the advanced graphics features that make the game world look beautiful and feel real.

Sound: The engine’s audio system lets developers make realistic sound effects, music, and voiceovers, which are important for hosting virtual events like concerts in the metaverse.

Multiplayer: Unreal Engine lets you play games with other people, so you can socialize in the metaverse.

Tools: A set of tools, such as tools for level design, animation, and scripting, helps developers make and change game content quickly so they can focus on the creative parts of making games.

Using the power of Unreal Engine 5, Lucidia Metaverse wants to make a groundbreaking project that will change the way people play games and give the crypto pre-sale market a unique chance.

The post Lucidia Metaverse: The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023 Runs on Unreal Engine 5 appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023: How the $LUCID Token Will Disrupt the Gaming, Staking, and Other Industries
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
The $LUCID token is the driving force behind all Lucidia Metaverse transactions. The $LUCID token has many applications, some of which are shown below.   In-game purchases, NFT trading, and virtual real estate are just some of the ways that gamers put $LUCID to use within the Lucidia ecosystem. It also lets users create their […]

The post The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023: How the $LUCID Token Will Disrupt the Gaming, Staking, and Other Industries appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
The $LUCID token is the driving force behind all Lucidia Metaverse transactions. The $LUCID token has many applications, some of which are shown below.

 

In-game purchases, NFT trading, and virtual real estate are just some of the ways that gamers put $LUCID to use within the Lucidia ecosystem. It also lets users create their own unique avatars, enter competitive events, and play in ranked games.

 

Staking: The staking mechanism provides incentives for keeping $LUCID tokens in a cold storage wallet for a predetermined time period. As an incentive, staking participants may be granted special privileges such as whitelisting for Lucidia NFT presales or the ability to cast votes in Lucidia DAO elections.

 

Tokenized $LUCID tokens are used for all purchases and sales in the Lucidia marketplace, which operates in tandem with the metaverse. Users can engage in activities such as exchanging NFTs, making money off of their artwork, and renting out virtual property.

 

The Lucidia Metaverse provides its users with a number of means through which they can acquire $LUCID tokens:

 

By taking part in games developed by industry leaders and attaining high scores, players can earn $LUCID tokens through the Play2Earn program.

 

  1. Learn2Earn: Customers pay with $LUCID tokens and receive tokens as a reward for completing customised educational courses.

 

  1. Train2Learn: Users can aid in the advancement of AI in the metaverse in exchange for $LUCID tokens.

 

  1. Fit2Earn: Users can keep tabs on their fitness progress with the help of Fit2Earn’s fitness partners and get rewarded in $LUCID tokens.

 

The $LUCID token is one of the best crypto pre-sales of 2023 because of the potential it has to change the gaming, staking, and virtual world industries.

The post The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023: How the $LUCID Token Will Disrupt the Gaming, Staking, and Other Industries appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: Race NFT – The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023, Revolutionizing Racing Games
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
To say that Race NFT is a revolutionary blockchain-based racing game is an understatement. Race NFT provides a one-of-a-kind racing experience for users all over the world thanks to its decentralized platform, exclusive car NFTs, and modifiable courses.   Characteristics that define Race NFT   Rare Automobile NFTs: The $LUCID token can be used to […]

The post Race NFT – The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023, Revolutionizing Racing Games appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
To say that Race NFT is a revolutionary blockchain-based racing game is an understatement. Race NFT provides a one-of-a-kind racing experience for users all over the world thanks to its decentralized platform, exclusive car NFTs, and modifiable courses.

 

Characteristics that define Race NFT

 

Rare Automobile NFTs: The $LUCID token can be used to buy rare automobile NFTs in-game. Since every vehicle has its own top speed, acceleration, and handling characteristics, every race is exciting in its own way.

 

Race Course Personalization: Participants can design and modify their own tracks, making for a really unique racing experience that also improves gameplay.

 

The winners of each race are awarded with prizes that can be used to improve the NFTs of their winning vehicles.

 

The marketplace facilitates transactions between users, creating a secondary market for car NFTs and allowing users to recoup some of their initial investment.

 

Security and transparency for NFTs and the game economy are guaranteed by Race NFT’s implementation of a decentralized blockchain.

 

Fast and efficient gaming is provided through a combination of smart contracts and off-chain mechanisms in this game.

 

Race NFT’s Unreal Engine 5 development ensures a high-quality user experience across a wide range of platforms.

 

With its innovative gaming experience that fuses cutting-edge technology with the excitement of racing, Race NFT is a key component of the finest crypto pre-sale of 2023. Don’t lose out on the chance to work on a ground-breaking project that will revolutionize the game industry.

The post Race NFT – The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023, Revolutionizing Racing Games appeared first on Lucidia.
